Uses of Class
ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.imu.Quaternion

  • Packages that use Quaternion 
    Package Description
    ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.imu
    A Inertial measurement unit (IMU) measures and reports a body's specific force, angular rate, and sometimes the orientation of the body, using a combination of accelerometers, gyroscopes, and magnetometers.

    • Uses of Quaternion in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.imu

      Methods in ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.imu that return Quaternion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion IMUDevice.getQuaternion()
      Determine the roll pitch and yaw from the gyro,accelerometer and magnetometer
